League 1
Bordeaux - Nantes: the CM of the Girondins is paid Pallois!
The CM Girondins has allowed to room the central defender after the victory of his side against FC Nantes (2-0) this Sunday afternoon.
03 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Rafael Da Silva



Ludovic BlasClub previous: EA GuingampIndemnity: 8 million eurosIcon Sport



Marcus CocoClub previous: EA GuingampIndemnity: 3 million eurosIcon Sport



Molla Wagu√©Club previous: UdineseIndemnity: 1,5 million eurosIcon Sport



Abou BaClub previous: AS Nancy-LorraineIndemnity: 1 million eurosIcon Sport



Dennis AppiahClub previous: RSC AnderlechtAdvance: 0.75 million eurosIcon Sport



Moses SimonClub previous: LevanteIndemnity: none (ready) Icon Sport



Denis PetricClub previous: EA GuingampIndemnity: noneIcon Sport



Bridge NdiluClub previous: Stade LavalloisIndemnity: noneIcon Sport



Cristian BenaventeClub previous: Pyramids FCAdvance: none (ready) Icon Sport



Mehdi AbeidClub previous: Dijon FCOIndemnity: noneIcon Sport



Alban LafontClub previous: FiorentinaIndemnity: none (ready) Icon Sport

FC Nantes: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




This Sunday afternoon, the Girondins de Bordeaux and FC Nantes were fighting on behalf of the 12th day of Ligue 1. A meeting with different stakes: climb the classification side of Bordeaux and find the chair of dolphin side Canaris. It was ultimately the locals who won with the achievements of Kamano and Ui-Jo. A victory that allows Paulo Sousa's men to climb to 7th place in the standings.




Pallois chambered




Ui-Jo feasted Sunday afternoon against Nantes + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

After the match, the Girondins de Bordeaux squad let itself go to a small valve headed by FC Nantes central defender Nicolas Pallois, who is the current holder on Sunday afternoon. The Community Manager posted a tweet referring to the sentence of Nicolas Pallois after the match against Olympique Marseille, also praising Hwang Ui-Jo, author of a goal and an assist today . Ligue 1 is just love.
